TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Hord family, posed in Rema and Earl Hord's living room, including from left in rear: Albert Dupree Sr., Cathy Hord, Vonda Hord Burwell Dupree, Leslie Hill, Sherrida Burwell, Marsha Hord, Lorenzo Hill; second row: Edgar Hord, Betty Hord Robinson, Albert Dupree, Rema Hord, Earl V. Hord, Pamela Hord, Earl F. Hord, little girl Judi Hord, Estella Hord Hill, Jimmy Joe Robinson; front row: Jay Robinson, Fred Hill, Marva Hord Harris, and Eugene Harris
